description:
You just crossed over... into the Twilight Zone. With a pinball that isn't, and flippers that aren't, keep telling yourself it's only a game. Earn highscores that are from another dimension with this classic joining the Pinball FX library.

Table features: 

- Keep feeding the Gumball Machine, unlock the ceramic Powerball and marvel at it's speed and bounce
- Fight the Power on the mini-playfield with your Magnaflips
- Get 'Lost in the Zone' and score big in a 6-ball multiball
- Collect mysterious Robots and Hitchikers to light modes, collect extra balls and get big points
- Enjoy the most toys and mechanics built into any Williams or Bally machine
name: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball: Twilight Zone
